claremont Colleges News

Dominating through the decades This Stag sweep marks the nineteenth consecutive sixthstreet loss for the sagehens volleyball team history PERIOD With five consecutive SCIAC section championships a cast of killers and zero sets dropped in league play so far this season the Athenas are flawless PERIOD The Sagehens made it competitive but they couldnt stand with the champs PERIOD

Though the pool reflected hues of cardinal and gold after last weekends men and womens swim and dive SCIAC Championship the Saghens are looking ahead and laying their nest for nationals PERIOD

ClaremontMuddScripps and PomonaPitzer won a combined six SCIAC Championships across five sports this fall the most ever in a single season PERIOD PomonaPitzer Football Without a doubt the most compelling narrative of the SCIACs fall season was the historic Cinderella story of PomonaPitzer football PERIOD Ranked fifth in the beginning of the

Cecil shed a tear from his rocking chair Saturday as after  years of waiting PERIOD The Sagehens defeated the Stags  to earn their first SCIAC championship since  PERIOD While both PP and CMS will be named cochampions the Sagehens victory has earned them their first ever trip to Nationals PERIOD

Perfection PERIOD CMS volleyball plucked the Sagehens in three sets Saturday to wrap up their undefeated season as SCIAC Champions PERIOD

Threepeat Sagehens womens soccer smote the Athenas  Saturday in a historic Sixth Street matchup to claim their third consecutive SCIAC tournament championship PERIOD

For most teams the finish line is the end of the race PERIOD However this fall for the PomonaPitzer mens cross country team there is more at stake than the podium PERIOD In support of Pomona dining hall workers in their ongoing negotiations with the administration the PP cross country team is wearing pins and Tshirts to spread awareness PERIOD

ClaremontMuddScripps and PomonaPitzer swimmers had the opportunity to qualify for nationals this past weekend PERIOD

The CMS womens cross country team picked up its tenth straight SCIAC championship  while the Stags beat out the Sagehens in a tiebreaker PERIOD

CMS mens water polo has ambitious goals for the season the foremost of which will be taking down their closest rival and longtime league champion PP PERIOD
